subject: Baseball
Doping (Sports)
Suits and Litigation
lead_paragraph: A suit says people tied to an anti-aging clinic hurt the sport by supplying drugs. It could also provide a way for Major League Baseball to pursue suspected dopers who haven’t tested positive.
snippet: A suit says people tied to an anti-aging clinic hurt the sport by supplying drugs. It could also provide a way for Major League Baseball to pursue suspected dopers who haven’t tested positive.
